data.title: Eva Longoria Parker Allegedly Splits from Tony Parker Amid Cheating Rumors
data.meta_description: Oh, man. Yesterday Eva Longoria Parker's rep said the Desperate Housewives star and husband Tony Parker were 100 percent fine, despite a report that he had filed for divorce in Texas.
data.text:
Oh, man. Yesterday Eva Longoria Parker's rep said the Desperate Housewives star and husband Tony Parker were 100 percent fine, despite a report that he had filed for divorce in Texas.

Whoa! I'm sure it doesn't, but doesn't it look like his shirt says "Divorce"?

Read the full story here.

But this morning, US Weekly is reporting that Longoria Parker left her basketball-playing husband of three years after discovering that "he has been exchanging personal texts with a mutual female friend for nearly a year—hundreds in just one month."

Read the full story here.

Not exactly sex in the champagne room, but still, if I knew Rory was exchanging hundreds of texts with another woman, I'd be pretty freaking upset!

Do you think superfluous texting with a member of the opposite sex is grounds for divorce? Or do you think this is something Eva and Tony can work through?
